description: Jetzt endlich auch für Android-Smartphones: Der kostenlose Gehaltsrechner von WISO! Top-aktuell mit der Berechnung für das Jahr 2015! Inklusive Vorjahre 2014 bis 2010! Die einzige Gehalts-App im Store mit "NettoShaker": Einfach Smartphone schütteln, das Wunsch-Nettogehalt eingeben… - und WISO Gehalt ermittelt sofort, wie hoch Ihre Gehaltsforderung sein muss. Die einzig perfekte App für Ihr nächstes Gehaltsgespräch! Im Brutto/Netto-Modus können Sie natürlich auch einfach Ihre aktuelle Gehaltsabrechnung prüfen. Oder ausrechnen, wie sich die nächste Gehaltserhöhung auf Ihr Nettogehalt auswirkt. WISO Gehalt ermittelt zuverlässig den Abzug von Steuern und Sozialabgaben für die Jahre 2010 bis 2015. Neben den aktuellen Steuertabellen werden auch viele Besonderheiten berücksichtigt, so dass Ihr Nettogehalt immer korrekt ermittelt wird: • Steuerklasse, mit Faktor für Klasse IV • Kinderfreibeträge, Kinder bei der Sozialversicherung • Lohnsteuerfreibeträge, z.B. für Fahrten zur Arbeit • Kranken-, Renten- und Arbeitslosenversicherung • Eigenbeiträge zur privaten Krankenversicherung • Zusatzbeiträge zur Krankenversicherung • Mini- und Midi-Jobs nach neuer Rechtslage • Altersentlastungsbetrag • Kirchensteuer So einfach geht's: Es genügen wenige Angaben: Sie geben Ihr Bruttogehalt ein, wählen Ihre Steuerklasse aus, geben Geburtsjahr und Bundesland an, und ob Sie Kirchensteuer zahlen. Dann wählen Sie ggf. weitere Punkte an, die Sie betreffen. Ihr Nettogehalt wird laufend berechnet und angezeigt. Sie sehen sofort, wie sich Ihre Eingaben auf Ihr Monatsnetto auswirken. So können Sie z.B. schnell und einfach ermitteln, was ein Wechsel der Steuerklasse bringt. Inklusive Versenden und Ausdrucken der Gehaltsberechnung! ...und wohin geht mein Geld? Der WISO Gehaltsrechner sagt Ihnen nicht nur, was netto übrig bleibt, sondern auch, wie viel Sie monatlich für was genau zahlen müssen: • Lohnsteuer • Solidaritätszuschlag • Kirchensteuer • Kranken- und Pflegeversicherung • Renten- und Arbeitslosenversicherung Zusätzlich zeigt der Rechner auch an, was der Arbeitgeber für Ihr Bruttogehalt letztlich wirklich zahlen muss. Den WISO Gehaltsrechner können Sie jederzeit und überall nutzen – ganz ohne Internetverbindung! Now finally available for Android smartphones: A free salary calculator by WISO! Top-to-date with the calculation for the year 2015! Including previous years from 2014 to 2010! The only content app in the store with "net Shaker": Simply shake smartphone, enter the desired net salary ... - and WISO content immediately determine how high does your salary requirement. The only perfect app for your next salary discussion! In gross / net mode, you can check your current payroll of course easy. Or figure out how the salary raise affect your net salary. WISO content reliably determines the deduction of taxes and social security contributions for the years 2010 to 2015. In addition to the current tax tables also many special features are taken into account, so your net salary is always determined correctly: • Tax class with factor for class IV • child allowances, children with the social security • tax credits, for example, for journeys to work • health, pension and unemployment insurance • own contributions to private health insurance • Additional contributions to health insurance • Mini and Midi jobs for new legislation • Age discharge amount • Church tax It's so easy: All you need is a few details: type your gross salary, choose your tax bracket, type and year of birth state, and if you pay church tax. Then select may show additional points that concern you. Your net salary is continuously calculated and displayed. You can immediately see how your entries affect your monthly net. So you can, for example, quickly and easily identify what brings a change of control class. Including sending and printing the content calculation! ... And where is my money? The WISO Salary Calculator not only tells you what is net left, but also how much you have to pay monthly for exactly what: • income tax • solidarity surcharge • Church tax • Health and Nursing • pension and unemployment insurance In addition, the computer also displays what the employer for your gross salary ultimately must really pay. The WISO salary calculator you can use anytime and anywhere - without internet connection!

description: Driving long distance can definitely be a chore, knowing where the next or closest rest area or rest stop to you shouldn't be. And with this app it doesn't have to be. Not only will it quickly show you the rest areas near you, you can filter with a simple button tap to show just rest areas in the direction you are heading! North, South, East and West, don't get let down thinking the rest area is just around the bend, only to find out its only for folks on the other side of the highway. Not only that, but you can search for locations not near you if you want to see whats in a destination area, and quickly snap back to your current location with just a button push. Tap on the marker to quickly see more information about that rest area ahead, what facilities and ammenities does it offer? Pet Area? RV Dump? Vending Machines? Handicapped Facilities? etc. Features: Works in all resolutions, tested from the smallest droids to the largest without issues. Simple, easy interface, fire it up and go. 1 Screen and 1 Finger interface. Keep your eyes on the road, no complicated multiple screen interactions. See whats near you (default behavior) via GPS, or search. Quickly snap back to your local location on the map with a single tap. Easily show only the rest stops in the direction you are travelling/interested in, or show all. Works in portrait and landscape mode, so don't be afraid to turn your phone sideways and pop out your keyboard.

description: Break towers of glass! Extended version includes better graphics and new backgrounds. Much better performance and enhanced physics. - 150 levels - level editor - relaxing ambient music for each background - real-like physical simulation - a lot of realtime visual effects - bright and clear graphics - very cool sounds of shattering glass - different backgrounds to choose - cool bonuses - OpenFeint Glass Tower 3 is a game with physical collisions and gravity simulation. Gameplay seems to be easy at first. The tower is constructed of blocks which are different in size, shape and color. Your aim is to break all blue blocks and to save as many red blocks as possible. Blue blocks add a score. Its amount depends on the size of the block. Red blocks subtract your score the same way. Also every broken red block subtract one "life". You have 3 lives at the beginning of each level. Due to physical-based engine every level can be over in different ways. Some blocks contain bonuses. When you break such block - the bonus takes off and rises on screen edge. You should have time to "catch" it, by taping on it by finger. Action of each bonus is explained during gameplay. Your game progress is always saved, so you can continue playing last level you reached any time.
release_text: Fixed "black screen" bug. Better Android 4.x support. Correct scaling for large screens. Extended version includes better graphics and new backgrounds. Much better performance and enhanced physics.

description: PLEASE BE INFORMED THAT ALL OUR LANGUAGE SUPPORT AND SERVICES ARE IN KOREAN. With 'NAVER Global Phrase Book', you don't need to worry about languages while traveling abroad! It is a multilingual phrasebook application featuring essential phrases in 15 different languages. Now you can travel with confidence. (Supported Languages: English, Japanese, Chinese, French, Spanish, German, Vietnamese, Russian, Italian, Thai, Indonesian, Mongolian) ■ Going overseas? Take 'NAVER Global Phrase Book' instead of thick and heavy phrasebooks. Check out the 2,000 practical and useful phrases in 15 different languages that you will definitely need during your trip overseas. It is easy to find the sentence you need, as the phrases are neatly organized by situations and you can search in Korean as well. ■ Read, listen, and speak. In addition to the original language, all phrases are spelled in Korean, helping you easily pronounce sentences even if you don't know the language. You can hear the pronunciation of native speakers by tapping the speaker icon. Make sure you get the right intonation and accent! ■ Learn keywords first. If a sentence is too long and difficult to repeat after, just say a keyword to get your point across. When you tap the keywords represented in blue letters, the speaker icon will appear along with the pronunciation in Korean. ■ Still too difficult? Just show your screen! It is a frustrating experience when people can't understand what you are trying to say, and even worse when you're in a hurry. In that case, just show them your screen in full screen mode. The application supports a full screen mode that enlarges letters, making it easier to show people. Please leave your inquiry with NAVER Customer Center ( https://m.help.naver.com/support/service/main.nhn?serviceNo=5599 ) in case a problem occurs while using app. The NAVER customer center is more than happy to help.

description: A personal bowling stats tracking application. Track your performance, discover where your game needs improvement, and work to increase your scores and improve your stats. Find out if you struggle on the Cheetah pattern, but only when bowling on lanes 19-20 with your favorite ball. Add your leagues, alleys, and equipment to the app, then go bowling. At the alley, enter the ball, oil pattern, and lanes for each game and track your pin fall on each shot. Afterwards, you can view your score, series, average, and stats. Stats such as strike, spare, single pin, multiple pin, and split conversion percentages can be queried by alley, league, lanes, ball, and oil pattern. This is not a game, just an application to track your real bowling stats. Contact me at bowlingnightapp@gmail.com with any comments or suggestions.

description: SynprezFM 2 is a programmable polyphonic synth with a multitouch dynamic keyboard, arpeggio, effects and 1024 built-in instrument patches. It uses Frequency Modulation, a lightweight method for generating complex harmonic waveforms by mixing or combining sine samples controlled by envelops and LFO. It is able to produce analog style pads, emulate classic or modern instruments, or invent new awesome crystalline sounds. SynprezFM 2 is also a Yamaha DX7 emulator, that can render with accuracy the sysex files you upload into an external storage directory setup by menu, in order to extend the experiment. You can also create and save your own patches, either by editing one of the (willingly) unsorted builtin ones, or starting from scratch with the "init voice" function. It is possible to record WAV, connect a MIDI keyboard with split capability (an experimental feature for Android 3.1 and above, using USB OTG cable), and take advantage of a small step sequencer. Even small devices can now leverage 2 synthesizers thanks to an optimized layout. To simplify the classic usage, complex functions are now only available in "expert mode" (activatable in the setup page): this regards the patch editor and the new micro-tuning feature. While you play, you can trigger an after-touch vibrato effect by dragging your fingers on the active keys or shift the keyboard to different octave. Other performance parameters can be accessed above the keyboard, including 2 types of portamento, a sensitivity range for pitch or volume modulations, and some effects that give a sense of depth when using a headset, especially on plucked sounds. You can also adjust the polyphony to adapt to your device capabilities. Thanks to an optimized core, you can hear up to 16 channels playing together, even on mid-range devices.
release_text: - MIDI experimental support (may not work with all hardware) - 2 keyboards on small screens - WAV recording - step sequencer in arpeggiator - new effects - micro-tuning - debug!..

description: Open ERP mobile is an android version of open ERP which is a generic solution with selected modules. Open ERP is the fastest growing Free & open-source business management solution. It is an integrated ERP architecture that optimizes work flow of an organization by bringing functions that were once housed with their own database such as financial, manufacturing, sales, purchases and warehouse management into a unified database that one can manage from a single point. Open ERP features includes Accounting & Financial, Sales & Services, Procurement and Logistics Execution, Inventory management, Human Resource Management, Product development and Manufacturing, Reporting and Analytics, Corporate services. Its released under AGPL license. There are more than 350 modules available in OpenERP for various business verticals. For any questions and suggestions contact us on android@igosttech.com

You definitely know some of them! Combining easy gameplay, beautiful songs and bright colorful visuals, Jelly Jam is sure to surprise you with how easy and fun learning and playing songs can be. description: If you coach Upward Soccer, this app is a must-have as you manage and organize your team. With the Upward Soccer Coach App, coaching just became easy, as it provides a quick, paperless way to coordinate key responsibilities at both practices and games. Simplicity is now at your fingertips as you: - Manage player/guardian information – The coach app allows you to not only record the names and phone numbers of each of your players, but also rank each player for substitution purposes. - Call, text and email parents from the app - Access practice plans – These age specific practice plans include fun and meaningful skills and drills as well as the mid-practice huddle devotion. With the coach app, you’ll no longer have to print the practice plans. - Substitute players on game day – One of the best features of the coach app is the ability to organize your substitution form each and every game. Since your players are already ranked, the coach app does the work of assigning player positions on your substitution form. You’ll be able to view who is in the game segment by segment! - Assign and track star distribution for each game – As you notice a moment in the game to award a player with a particular star, you can now use the coach app to assign that star to the player instantly! It also keeps track of which stars each player has received throughout the course of the season! Notice: This app does not handle level 4 substitutions

description: - Select processes that should be excluded from being restarted/closed! - Schedule automatic fast reboots (e.g. every day at 4am) - Option to automatically fast reboot when you unlock your device (from standby) - Comes with a widget and a direct shortcut to instantly start a reboot Simulates a reboot by closing/restarting all core and user processes (configurable) and thus frees up memory. Your phone should be much snappier after using Fast Reboot Pro. Fast Reboot Pro now includes an option to automatically perform a "fast reboot" every time you unlock your device (i.e. when you turn it back on from sleep and "slide" to unlock). This way, your phone will _always_ be as fast and responsive as possible! In addition, you can now schedule a fast reboot so that your phone is fast rebooted automatically at a certain time each day (configured by you, e.g. 4am when you're least likely to be using your phone) Want to perform a fast reboot when your battery drops below 30%, or when you leave work? Download the free Fast Reboot plugin to integrate the app with Locale / Tasker: http://goo.gl/FlgLA If you don't see the widget in the widget-list, please move the app back to your phone's internal memory (Settings, Application Settings, Fast Reboot Pro, Move to Phone). This is a limitation of the Android system which I unfortunately have no control over!
release_text: v4.1: - Fix for Android 5.1.1+ v4.0: - Complete redesign based on ICS/JB style - The "reboot on unlock"-feature is now compatible with GO Locker! - Added separate notification options for manual/scheduled autoreboots - Option to delay auto-reboots on screen-lock for 5 seconds to prevent accidental reboots - The list of restarted/closed apps is now sorted alphabetically

description: Goob Alarm Clock (Get Out Of Bed Alarm Clock) Free Alarm clock that can only be switched off when you are really out of bed! The alarm clock uses the Wifi signal strength to determine your position. You will only be able to switch off your alarm when you are close enough to your WiFi router. NEW: Android wear watch faces NEW: Support for Pebble smartwatch Setup video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aE7dH1nlQm0 Like us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/goobalarmclock Setup (Get Out Of Bed ) Goob Alarm 1) If you are connected to a Wifi router you will see the current wifi level in the list of your alarms. The range is 0-100 with 100 max strength. 2) Go as close as possible to your wifi router and note the wifi level 3) Setup your alarm by selecting the alarm (short tap on the time) or create a new one by selecting menu - add alarm. 4) Set Dismiss type to 'Run to Wifi' and also select Dismiss Test button. The Dismiss Test button allows you to dismiss at all times ***use dismiss button only to test your setup***. 5) Set the Wifi Strength to the level you were getting close to your wifi router. 6) Set the time + 3 minutes, so you can test and press Done. Enable the alarm by pressing the square next to the wifi level. Press back or home key. Go to your bedroom and wait until the alarm sounds. 7)Unlock your phone and go towards your wifi router, you will see the wifi level changing in the dialog box. When you are close enough you can dismiss the alarm. (In test mode you can dismiss even when the level is not reached) 8)If all works well, deselect 'Dismiss Test button' in the dismiss type settings menu so you can only dismiss the alarm when you are out of bed! Troubleshooting - Advanced setup – Permissions explained 1) My Wifi router is in my bedroom (or close to it) so my Wifi strength is very high in my bed. Select 'Run from wifi' in Dismiss type and set the 'Wifi weakness' to a lower level than what you get in your bedroom. When the alarm goes off you have to move away from your Wifi router in order to be able to dismiss the alarm. Combining 'Run to Wifi' and 'Run from wifi' is also possible. 2) When you are tempted to force close the app or switch the phone off while the alarm sounds, you may try the advanced settings to block this (press menu when you see the alarm list). 3) Not connected to a Wifi router. If you have Wifi networks but are not connected to them you can enter the Wifi SSID and use the signal strength from that network. You do not need to logon to that network, only the signal strength is used! 4) Wifi will be turned on just before the alarm sounds (if it was switched off). This is why the app needs the “CHANGE WI-FI STATE” permission. 5) The app will add an Alarm icon to the home screen if the alarm is set. This is why the app needs the “MODIFY GLOBAL SYSTEM SETTINGS” 6) When a call comes in while the alarm sounds the alarm volume will go down. This is why the app needs the “READ PHONE STATE AND IDENTITY” permission. 7) “FULL INTERNET ACCESS” is needed for the banners (commercials). You can also wake up with music, using the music alarm feature by selecting a music song. With Goob Alarm you can select a free digital LCD alarm clock or analog glow in the dark alarm clock. Goob Alarm is smart, you have to get out of bed to turn off the alarm. Now with pink and green LCD Android wear watch faces If you would like to help translate the app in your language please visit: http://ackuna.com/translate-/goob-alarm-clock-free/ Full license: http://www.sygel.com/sygelsite/echip/license.html

description: Provides a useful interface for calculating unknown quantities in the fields of electronics and electrical engineering. Current features include: Resistor colour codes - tells you the resistance, tolerance, upper and lower values, and E-series information for any colour-coded resistor. Ohm's Law and Power Calculator - Finds any unknown quantity in terms of voltage, current, resistance and power dissipation for any omhic component. Series/Parallel Value Calculator. Finds the total value for any series or parallel combination of resistors, capacitors, or inductors. The calculator can also find an individual value given the value for the whole combination. Reactance Finder - Calculates the reactance of any capacitor or inductor from the circuit frequency. Power Triangle - Calculates real, apparent, and reactive power dissipation as well as impedance phase angle in any electrical system. Resistivity - Finds the resistance of any wire or prism from its dimensions and resistivity, or vice versa. Magnetic Fields - Finds the force that acts on a conductor in a magnetic field. Capacitors - Finds the charge and energy stored in a capacitor. Many more electrical utilities coming soon, with regular updates. Plus, NO ADS. Please rate or give feedback. Feel free to give suggestions or comments.
release_text: 23/02/12 - (1.1) - Improved UI, added Pro upgrade option. 28/02/12 - (1.2) - Removed a bug causing 'Webpage not Available' errors in the series/parallel converter calculators. 31/10/12 - (1.3) - Added Capacitors and Magnetic Fields, enabled screen rotation and numeric keyboard.

description: Being and Thinking !!! This strategy Game will make you think and concentrate for hours if you accept the challenge. The game will randomly place three color balls on the game board at every round, you have to strategically select one ball (tap on ball) and move it to the most convenient location (tap on square). Lines of 5 or more balls of the same color are eliminated, adding to the score. Lines game or balls online is a clone of a famous Russian board game which was played in almost every PC - equipped office in the 90 - 92. Now it's a android game designed to help you overcome cubicle boredom.

description: Have you always wished for a study buddy that could help you prepare for your PRE-MEDICAL exams? An app that would assist you in transforming your weak areas into strong ones as well as display your percentile rankings! Look no further than Mytestbuddy's AIPMT test prep app (Formerly known as NEET UG). This hassle free, light weight, no-nonsense app lets you practice for your PRE-MEDICAL exams for FREE on the go, without any advertisements or false promises. It runs offline, so you don't have to have an internet connection every-time you wish to practice. The content is prepared and regularly updated by the most experienced doctors from leading medical institutes. Inclusions: a) 1000+ Practice questions b) Topic wise questions c) Report Card d) Score Card e) Offline running capabilities The National Eligibility cum Entrance Test or NEET-UG is a qualifying entrance exam for students who wish to study any undergraduate medical course (MBBS), dental course (BDS) or postgraduate course (MD / MS) in government or private medical colleges in India. This App is brought you by http://www.mytestbuddy.com . It is designed to improve your Knowledge about Biology, Physics and Chemistry subjects.

description: This is the second version of Organic Chemistry Mechanisms. Due to me using a second software update kit, I cannot update my old app and update it and retain my 1,000+ down loaders. So to get my user base back, I am offering versions 2.0 of this app for %50 OFF!!! MCAT, College Organic Chemistry. This app covers summaries and detailed electron pushing diagrams of all of the following topics. Best viewed in Landscape Mode. Every single "-" below includes a description and a detailed reaction mechanism. Alkanes - Thermal Cracking - Pyrolysis - Combustion - Free Radical Halogenation Alkenes - Electrophilic Addition of HX to Alkenes - Acid Catalyzed Hydration of Alkenes - Electrophilic Addition of Halogens to Alkenes - Halohydrin Formation - Free Radical Addition of HX to Alkenes - Catalytic Hydrogenation of Alkenes - Oxidation of Alkenes to Vicinal Diols - Oxidative Cleavage of Alkenes - Ozonolysis of Alkenes - Allylic Halogenation - Oxymercuration-Demercuration - Hydroboration of Alkenes Alkynes - Electrophilic Addition of HX to Alkynes - Hydration of Alkynes - Free Radical Addition of HX to Alkynes - Electrophilic Halogenation of Alkynes - Hydroboration of Alkynes - Catalytic Hydrogenation of Alkynes - Reduction of Alkynes with Alkali Metal - Ammonia - Formation and Use of Acetylide Anion Nucleophiles Alkyl Halides - Coupling of Alkyl Halides with Gilman Reagents - SN2 Mechanism with Alkyl Halides - SN1 Mechanism with Alkyl Halides - E2 Mechanism with Alkyl Halides - E1 Mechanism with Alkyl Halides Conjugated Species - SN1 Mechanism with Allylic Cation Intermediate - 1,2 and 1,4 Addition to Conjugated Diene - Diels-Alder Reaction Aromatic Compounds - Electrophilic Aromatic Substitution with Halogen - Electrophilic Aromatic Substitution - Nitration - Electrophilic Aromatic Substitution - Sulfonation - Friedel-Crafts Alkylation - Friedel-Crafts Acylation - Nucleophilic Aromatic Substitution - Alkylbenzene Oxidation - Alkylbenzene Halogenation Alcohols & Ethers - Electrophilic Aromatic Substitution with Halogen - Electrophilic Aromatic Substitution - Nitration - Electrophilic Aromatic Substitution - Sulfonation - Friedel-Crafts Alkylation - Friedel-Crafts Acylation - Nucleophilic Aromatic Substitution - Alkylbenzene Oxidation - Alkylbenzene Halogenation Alcohols & Ethers - Dehydration of Alcohols - Reaction of Alcohols with HX – Dehydrohalogenation - Reaction of Alcohols with Thionyl Chloride - Reaction of Alcohols with Phosphorus Tribromide - Oxidation of Alcohols - Alkoxide Ion Formation from Alcohols - Reaction of Alcohols to form Ethers - Williamson Ether Synthesis - Acid Cleavage of Ethers - Epoxidation of Halohydrins - Acid Epoxide Ring Opening Aldehydes & Ketones - Reduction of Ketones and Aldehydes - Reduction of Aryl Alkyl Ketones - Oxidation of Aldehydes and Ketones - Reaction of Grignard Reagents with Aldehydes and Ketones - The Wittig Reaction - Acetal Formation - The Wolff-Kishner Reaction - Reductive Amination - The Cannizzaro Reaction - Acid or Base Catalyzed Enolization - Alpha Halogenation - Haloform Reaction of Methyl Ketones - Aldol Condensation - Conjugate Nucleophilic Addition - Conjugate Addition of Gilman Reagents Carboxylic Acid Derivatives - Reduction of Ketones and Aldehydes - Reduction of Aryl Alkyl Ketones - Oxidation of Aldehydes and Ketones - Reaction of Grignard Reagents with Aldehydes and Ketones - The Wittig Reaction - Acetal Formation - The Wolff-Kishner Reaction - Reductive Amination - The Cannizzaro Reaction - Acid or Base Catalyzed Enolization - Alpha Halogenation - Haloform Reaction of Methyl Ketones - Aldol Condensation - Conjugate Nucleophilic Addition - Conjugate Addition of Gilman Reagents

description: Important Note: Only for use with Theme Chooser / Theme Engine. A custom rooted ROM with Theme Engine / Chooser is required to run this application. If you do not understand these terms and they just go over your head, this application is not for you. This version of Nue contains Fi Red Elements / This is the red variant of Nue. (Originally Carribean Green) Nue follows a Flat-lined UI - Monotone Design Language. Aimed to provide a great user experience, Nue was designed keeping in mind the ability of the human eye - It was made sure that the colors were not too saturated/strong making even the unusual themed elements look subtle. Nue would soon be released in 1 different color - Orange. It is currently available in the Original Carribean Green, Fi Red, Qua Blue & Air White Variant. The attention to detail gone into Nue is incredible. Each and every draw (themed elements) was carefully analyzed on 4 different screens in order to get the perfect color, sharpness & anti-aliasing qualities. Having various elements, Nue had to be properly coded & of course designed. Nue is optimized for XXHDPI & XHDPI devices. To know your screen density, you could go to: http://goo.gl/alcpMv IMPORTANT: Those who uses a device with 512mb or less RAM, I recommend NOT applying the bootanimation. Also, recently all the ROMs Hard-Coded Quick Settings and Status Bar Battery Icons - Therefore this theme DOES NOT include those icons. Also, All ROMs hardcoded the battery tile (Normal aosp behavior) therefore editing it for QS is impossible using the new theme chooser framework - PA will soon be rewriting it to make it themeable.﻿ Nue Includes: Nue Wallpapers (Default & Lockscreen) Nue Tones (Nue 'Crafted Ringtone, Notification Tone & Alarm Tone) Fi/Nue Navigation Bar Dot-Icons (Minimalistic Dot Navbar Items with State Changes - Perfectly matching the theme) Nue Custom Lockscreen Nue/Layars Bootanimation Nue Custom Google Keyboard Skin Nue Slim Fonts Themed Items: Holo Dark & Holo Light Values Quick Settings Icons Settings Icons (PA, CM11) Notification Backgrounds Glowdots (Lockscreen, Google Now Swipe Up) Action Bars Flat Action Bars (Dark & Light) Buttons & Checkboxes (Buttons, Radio Buttons, Checkboxes, Scrubber Tabs) Navigation Bar Glow (Flat, No Shadow) Notification Panel (Dark - Fi - Red) Custom Switches Dialog Windows Alert Windows List Views Lockscreen Layers (Player Background) Menu Windows/Lists/Dropdowns Progress Bars (Fi -Red) Scrubbers (Fi - Red) Rating Stars (Fi - Red) Keyboard Text Handlers Toast Frame Calculator UI Appwidget Settings Google Quick Search Toast Frame Easter Egg! Bonus: Whatsapp Action Bar - Dark Nue Fi is a part of the Layars Theme Project. Community & Support - http://goo.gl/rkYOwq Note: This theme is optimized for Paranoid Android (PA) - http://goo.gl/XXr3gv

HIFI NEVER WENT AWAY, IT JUST NEVER WENT WIRELESS. UNTIL NOW. The Bluesound Controller App is designed to be the full-featured remote control for all Bluesound Players. Available for Android tablets and phones, the Bluesound Controller App uses your home WiFi network to connect with Bluesound Players and play all the music you love anywhere in the home for a wireless multi-room music experience like no other. Get on-demand access to your music libraries on your home network, stream live Internet radio from any place in the world, or listen to one of the many music services available on Bluesound, all from the palm of your hand with the easy-to-use Bluesound Controller App. It’s everything your Bluesound Player has to offer at your fingertips. Bluesound’s expanding collection of digital music services includes: Deezer®, HDtracks®, Highresaudio®, iHeartRadio®, JUKE®, Murfie®, Napster®, Qobuz®, Rdio®, Rhapsody®, Slacker Radio®, Spotify®, TIDAL®, TuneIn® and WiMP®. About Bluesound: An alliance of audiophiles. We are the designers, engineers and passionate music lovers who have spent our lives in the music industry. Our founders pioneered HiFi in the 70s - innovation and the pursuit of perfection in audio runs deep in our collective DNA. Bluesound’s sole mission is to create innovative wireless digital audio products and technologies that allow for the most true-to-life music experience possible. It is the first wireless digital multi-room system to fully support High Res Audio with an extraordinary audiophile-grade feature-set that all music lovers will appreciate. Bluesound is not just another computer company. Bluesound is all about sound..

description: In the classroom or at the bar, Quick Poll Pro lets you text multiple-choice questions to your friends, colleagues or classmates, gather up the answers and send out the results. Sort of like the ‘Classroom Response Device’ or ‘Clicker’ that instructors use. With Quick Poll Pro, all anyone needs is a cell phone. For example: “Where do guys want to meet tonight?”, OK, “Most of you want to meet at the Brewery downtown, so let’s go there” The Pro version has up to nine choices per poll and has individual and group support. Quick Poll Free is limited to three poll choices.

description: This application is android version of Super PI which is used to test the performance and stability of your android device, by calculating π to a specified number of digits after the decimal point. Features: * Calculate Pi using FFT and AGM, fast and reliable algorithm. * Optimize for most ABI(Application Binary Interface) including armeabi, armeabi-v7a, mips and x86. * Support pre-defined typical digits up to 4 million. * Easily share your results to friends by single click. Here is the result from my Galaxy Nexus, for your reference: ====CPU Information==== Device Model: Galaxy Nexus CPU Type: ARMv7 Processor rev 10 (v7l) CPU Frequency: 1200MHz Number of Processor: 2 ====Pi Computation Result==== 8K digits: 0.083 seconds 16K digits: 0.175 seconds 32K digits: 0.311 seconds 128K digits: 1.671 seconds 512K digits: 9.787 seconds 1M digits: 24.251 seconds 2M digits: 55.583 seconds 4M digits: 130.073 seconds If you have any comment, please send to support@rhmsoft.com , thanks.

description: AVAILABLE ONLY IN FRENCH DISPONIBLE SEULEMENT EN FRANÇAIS « La fonge du Québec » présente un répertoire à jour des connaissances sur l'ensemble des champignons macroscopiques du Québec. Ce recueil encyclopédique regroupe les espèces selon leurs caractéristiques phylogénétiques avec des descriptions détaillées macroscopiques, microscopiques et écologiques, ainsi que de nombreuses photos prises tant en nature qu’en laboratoire. Tous les champignons décrits ont déjà été observés au Québec. Toutes leurs photos présentées ont également été prises au Québec. Cet ouvrage est le résultat du travail d'un grand nombre de passionnés de mycologie qui se sont regroupés depuis 2006 pour mettre en commun leurs connaissances et leur expertise dans le but de faire l'inventaire complet des champignons du Québec. Ainsi, pas moins d'une dizaine d'experts, souvent assistés de collègues étrangers, ont participé à l'identification des spécimens photographiés, de même qu'à leur description. Plus d'une cinquantaine d’autres passionnés de photographie, de mycologie et de microscopie ont aussi contribué, par leurs photos, planches et observations, à une couverture photographique complète et, pour plusieurs espèces, à la première observation rapportée pour le Québec ou même l'Amérique du Nord. Dans la plupart des cas, les descriptions des espèces citées dans cette application ont été adaptées directement à partir des diagnoses originales et enrichies des notes personnelles de mycologues locaux compilées par les auteurs de cet ouvrage. Des efforts considérables ont été déployés pour que l'ouvrage incorpore les dernières découvertes de la taxonomie et de la systématique moderne. Ainsi, la nomenclature utilisée réfère aux grands ouvrages, tel Index Fungorum et Funga Nordica, tout en respectant les particularités propres au contexte Nord-Est de l'Amérique du Nord. Le répertoire contient aussi plus de 100 espèces inédites, non encore publiées officiellement, mais pour la plupart officiellement reconnues au Québec et, dans tous les cas, caractérisées en détails, tant au niveau macroscopique que microscopique, par le mycologue québécois, Yves Lamoureux. Ces espèces figurent ici avec la permission de leur découvreur. L'application pour mobile s’avère le media idéal pour une science en évolution constante et rapide. Cette version de La fonge du Québec n’est pas parfaite. Nous sommes conscients qu'elle contient quelques imprécisions, ambigüités et sans doutes quelques incorrections. Elle sera régulièrement bonifiée au cours des mois et des années à venir. Nous vous serons très reconnaissants de signaler toute erreur de contenu comme de forme à jacques.landry@mycoquebec.org Mycoquébec est un organisme sans but lucratif. Tous les profits de la vente de cette application seront consacrés au développement et la promotion de la mycologie au Québec. La version 1.21.2015 contient 2491 espèces illustrées de 17949 photos et dont 2422 sont décrites autant au niveau macroscopique que microscopique. Mots-clés : Champignon, nature, plein-air, forêt, champignons, bolet, chanterelle AVAILABLE ONLY IN FRENCH AVAILABLE ONLY IN FRENCH "The Quebec a dream" has an updated directory of knowledge on all macroscopic fungi Quebec. This encyclopedic collection includes species according to their phylogenetic characteristics with detailed macroscopic, microscopic and ecological descriptions and numerous photographs taken both in nature and laboratory. All the described fungi have been reported in Quebec. All their photos presented have also been taken in Quebec. This book is the result of the work of many mycology enthusiasts who have come together since 2006 to share their knowledge and expertise to make a complete inventory of fungi Quebec. No less than a dozen experts, often assisted by colleagues abroad, participated in the identification of specimens photographed, as well as their descriptions. Over fifty other photography enthusiasts, mycology and microscopy have also contributed with their pictures, plates and comment on a complete photographic coverage and, for many species, the first case reported in Quebec or even North America. In most cases, the descriptions of the species mentioned in this application were adapted directly from the original diagnoses and enriched personal notes local mycologists compiled by the authors of this book. Considerable effort has been made to ensure that the work incorporates the latest discoveries of modern taxonomy and systematics. Thus, the nomenclature used refers to large structures such Index Fungorum and Funga Nordica, while respecting the special features of the Northeast context of North America. The directory also contains more than 100 unpublished species, not yet officially published, but for the most officially recognized in Quebec and, in any case, characterized in detail, both macroscopic and microscopic level, by the Quebec mycologist, Yves Lamoureux. Such species are listed here with the permission of their discoverer. The mobile application proves the ideal media for a science in constant and rapid evolution. This version of The Quebec a dream is not perfect. We are aware that it contains some inaccuracies, ambiguities and doubts without some inaccuracies. It will be regularly enhanced in the months and years ahead. We will be very grateful for any errors in content and form jacques.landry@mycoquebec.org Mycoquébec is a non-profit organization. All profits from the sale of this application will be devoted to the development and promotion of mycology in Quebec. 01.21.2015 The version contains 2491 species illustrated of 17949 photos and 2422 which are described as the macroscopic and microscopic level. Keywords: mushroom, nature, outdoors, forest, mushrooms, boletus, chanterelle
release_text: La version 1.21.2015 contient la base de données de Mycoquébec du 20 mai 2015, soit 2 491 espèces (+82) , 17 949 photos (+1300) , 2422 descriptions (+50) - Les espèces sont désormais regroupées selon leur lien phylogénétique réel. De plus un classement selon des groupes commodes est également proposé. -Pour facilité la recherche des espèces une table de synonymes ou d'autres noms précédemment utilisés au Québec a été ajoutée. - JQ (2.1.3) , JQM (1.4.5) et Cordova (5.0.0)

description: This app takes education to a whole new level by reinterpreting known theories with artistic depictions. Scattered with engineered interactivity and reinforced with fully illustrated practice questions, the Calculus App presents a new educational paradigm that will enrich the learning experience of our knowledge-seeking audience. Now you can learn about differentiation and integration minus the boring bits of simply going through equations and formulas FEATURES: - 6 Complete Chapters to cover the fundamentals of Calculus including: Introduction to Differentiation, Applications of Differentiation, Transcendental Functions, Introduction to Integration, Applications of Integration, and Integration Techniques. - 3 Feature Videos to introduce the topic to you - Fully narrated tutorials guide you on the basic concepts of Calculus - Fun-to-watch videos introduce you to the world of Calculus; learn about fun facts and not just the technical concepts - Animated and illustrated concepts makes learning from scratch or refreshing easy - Interactive sections reinforce important concepts - Move away from the usual style of learning in the classroom - Learn at your own pace: pause or replay the tutorials at your command - Track your progress from the Navigation Menu - Try the sample math questions and check your answers against model solutions Unsure about the Calculus Interactive App Full Edition? Try out the FREE Lite Edition ⇒ https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.neumediatechnologies.calculus Check out reviews of the lite edition on: xda-developers.com - http://www.xda-developers.com/android/enjoy-learning-calculus-with-calculus-interactive/ Android Tapp - http://www.androidtapp.com/calculus-interactive-app-lite/ Note: This works best on the tablet platform.

description: Flowd – The Music Lovers’ Social Network Flowd is the perfect app to follow your favorite music acts! Flowd lets you chat directly to your favorite artists, find fellow fans, check into gigs and take part in promotions; get all the red-hot artist news as it breaks or simply discover new music acts! Flowd also brings you fabulous messaging tools to connect with your friends, as well as location based features for checking into places, gigs and parties. Connect Flowd to Facebook and Twitter as well and it becomes the one stop shop for your social networking! Features: •Artist pages & events: follow what's going on with your favorite music acts and talk with them directly! •Sync Flowd to Facebook and Twitter for easy management of your social networks •Places creation and check-in. Share your favorite spots with the world! •Public shouts and private messaging between Flowd friends •Take photos and send picture messages If you are an artist, you can sign yourself into Flowd with an artist profile on: flowd.com/artist_registration Download Flowd now for FREE and try it out! *** FLOWD IN THE PRESS *** “…this is a clever idea and could be extremely popular with music lovers.” – Mashable “Flowd’s location-based aspect has the potential to bring entirely new meaning to the idea of “closely following” your favorite artist.” – MacWorld *** FOLLOW US ON *** Twitter www.twitter.com/flowdapp Facebook www.facebook.com/flowdapp Or check out our homepage on flowd.com

description: Over 500,000 downloaded worldwide. Here are some reviews: “Amazing, I love this app, works great.” “Got pregnant first time around with this app.” “Really good information, clear and simple layout, easy to use.” My Ovulation Calculator is a simple and easy to use application to calculate the time of ovulation and determine the fertile period. By just recording the first date of your last menstrual period and the average number of days in your menstrual cycle, your ovulation date and your fertile period will be shown. Being intimate during the fertile period greatly improves the chances for you to conceive. The app also shows the expected date of delivery if you happen to conceive at that time. This app is designed for Android Devices.

Challenge your friends’ music knowledge by picking a tune, singing it and asking them to guess what you sang. Truly Addictive and Fun! 1. Create a game with friends or by random 2. Record yourself singing with help from a sample and lyrics 3. Send the song to your opponent 4. Wait for them to guess the song Simple! Incredible features: ♫ Play with friends across your Android or iPhone Find your friends through their username, Facebook or e-mail and take your turn to sing or to guess. ♫ Turn based gameplay After taking your turn, wait for your opponent to guess and then take your turn at guessing what they sung. ♫ Statistics Look at your statistics to evaluate how you are performing in your games against your opponents. ♫ Shop ♪ Buy Bombs to help you eliminate invalid letters. ♪ Buy Hints to help you in guessing songs. ♪ Buy Golden passes to automatically guess the answer for you. ♫ Push notifications ♪ Push notifications allow you to receive alerts when it’s your turn. ♫ Lyrics ♪ Lyrics can be used as guidance to the song you are singing. ♫ Song samples ♪ Use song samples to help you remember the song that you are supposed to be singing. Buy the songs from Amazon once you have taken your turn. Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/singmesomethinghq Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/singmehq

description: >> The french video game finally translated for Android ! [Adventure game - Polar interactive U.S. / Guaranteed virus free and without advertising / complete set without additional payment] >> SYNOPSIS After stopping a mafia kingpin, Frederic Hunter, a police officer must hide in the village of his childhood, in France ... But upon his arrival, he discovers the body of a young girl, Laura, at the edge of the river. The adventure begins: examine the body of the victim, browse the village, ask its inhabitants ... and try to discover what happened to poor Laura: suicide, accident or murder? ... Throughout the investigation, the adventure takes a turn most mysterious. What are those lights in the forest ? Why Laura's body appears to have unknown radiations ? What is DRM (French military intelligence services) to the village? Is this the Mafia will find Frederic Hunter ? ... Many puzzles that you must solve in order to understand what is happening in this strange village ... >> RECOMMENDATIONS The game is an interactive detective story ... Without violent content may be likely to shock an audience young or sensitive. It is strictly note recommended for children (-18 years). >> IMPORTANT The game contains a lot of multimedia content (400 MB). In order not to overload the shelf low capacity, the game does not install background images, music and videos. It downloads directly on a server without ever storing. The game weighs no more than 27Mb on card (and 250 ko on ROM). Each image must make less than a second to appear [between 0.75 and instantly dry under normal conditions]. The first images can be longer (a few seconds), but everything falls into place slowly ... The images and their load are optimized. The music and sound effects are pre-loaded from the start of the game. As for the video, it is charged streaming (live).

description: Dominate your Draft with Draft Assistant. Top 50 Apps on iPhone and iPad App Store - August 10, 2013. Featured as #3 in Android Sprint App Store Downloads Page Easy Sort by position or by MFL Top 300 Draft selection based on 100k+ Fantasy Football Players. Features: • Simple UI • Simple Intuitive Touch Controls • Easy Drag and Drop Add to My Team • Easy Drag and Drop Add to Drafted List • Fast updates • Sort by Position • Search by Name • Quick View of Draft Pool • Store multiple Draft Teams Be prepared to draft the best players at anytime during your draft for myfantasyleague.com, ESPN.com, yahoo.com, or cbssportline.com. Fantasy Football Draft Assistant 2013 App by Marvel Apps LLC fresh new unique user interface to managing your fantasy football draft blows the competition away by making the content easily consumable for playing in your fantasy football league. This fresh take allows the user to easily make quick decisions by swiping among the top players as projected by MyFantasyLeague.com (MFL) 100,000 leagues. One can view the entire Top 300 players projections or organize the players by position.  As soon as the user find who is looking for, its a simple swipe up to add him to his team. Fantasy Football Draft Assistant is organized in 3 rows.  The Top Row is your selection of players on draft night.  The Bottom row is the players drafted by other fantasy teams in your league.  Separating the two rows is the pool of the Top 300 MyFantasyLeague.com NFL Players ranked in order (1-300).  This is an aggregated list of the Top NFL Players drafted over 100,000 MFL Fantasy Football leagues.  MFL is known throughout the Fantasy Sports industry as one of the most comprehensive Fantasy Tools on the market. MFL users range from die-hard FFB players to casual players. According to the Fantasy Sports Trade Association (FSTA), the collection of hundreds of influential fantasy sports companies in the industry.   In 2008, 2010 and 2011, The MyFantasyLeague.com was awarded the Top Fantasy Tools -Fantasy Commissioner, League Manager PRoducts from all of the FSTA.  An honor that has been only given to 2 companies over the past 6 years, CBSSports.com and MyFantasyLeague.com. With the unique developers API from MFL, Fantasy Football Draft Assistant was created. Knowing players name is typical, but being face to face with player profile pictures tells a different story.  A story that gives every fantasy football player an edge in the draft. As the saying goes, a picture is worth a thousand words.  Well with Draft Assistant, relating faces with names and names with faces could not be easier.  Everyone experiences making decisions with the very best information in a short amount of time. Users will select NFL player on a personal level since he has seen his picture before other news or articles. Simply knowing if the player is injured is the one of the most important aspect of Draft night. Fantasy Football Draft Assistant simple view of injury reports have red crossed band-aids as a layer over the players profile picture.  For more details, a quick summary labeled in red is shown below the players name.  This provides a comprehensive view if the user should draft the player. The UI of Fantasy Football Draft Assistant is designed to be Clutter free to satisfy that 10 second need to know who to select during my Live Fantasy Draft.  Swipe up is my team, swipe down means he’s not available.

description: TETRIS FOR WORDS. An addictive tile based word game to test your lexical skills combined with speed and strategy. Use a variety of stationery like ink bottles, erasers, scissors and dusters in different modes to make as many words as possible before the board fills up. --------------------- VERSION 1.1 --------------------- *STATIONERY SHOP An endless supply of stationery to make more words and increase your game time to longer durations! ------------------ FEATURES ------------------ SOCIAL LEADERBOARDS Look up online leader boards to help you keep track of who is the best in the world. Brag to your friends by posting your scores to Facebook. Keep track of your personal high score and compare your scores with your friends and the rest of the world! STATIONERY AND BOOSTER MODES 4 power-ups and 4 modes to help increase your scores and challenge your friends, including ways to extend your game time, find longer words, and much more! Use inks, erasers, scissors and dusters to remove tiles from the board to play longer and score higher. Earn even more points with special modes to double/triple points per word, slow down falling tiles and more points for vowels! ACHIEVEMENTS 20 achievements to be unlocked! Make as many words to score more points and unlock achievements! STAMPS Get stamps for every game you play. Collect them all! STATIC BOARD Get 10 seconds on a static board at the end of every game to make more words! UNIQUE BOARDS Each game has a unique game board leading to an infinite combination of games! Woorddict uses the standard dictionary, so Scrabble and Words With Friends players can sharpen their vocabulary. BEAUTIFUL AND OPTIMIZED Woorddict is optimized for and tested on each device we support. Smooth graphics and engaging sounds make for a beautiful and exciting experience. If you are a player of games like Scrabble or Wordament, and you like playing time based word games, then Woorddict is the game for you! ------------------ PERMISSIONS: This app requires the following permissions for the following reasons: Internet Access - Submit scores, brag to your friends and read high score lists. Get Accounts and Use Credentials - Allow you to connect your Facebook account with. The information obtained is not used for any other purpose and is never transferred to any third parties. Billing - Support for in-app purchases from the stationery shop. ------------------ Love playing Woorddict? Show some more love. Like us on Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/woorddict If you find any bug, please let us know. Support email : codeandart.games@gmail.com

description: **Funcional solo en la república de Guatemala** Identificador es una aplicación simple y gratuita, su funcionalidad es brindarle al usuario el nombre de la compañía telefónica a la que esta llamando. La idea de la aplicación identificador surgió a partir de que en Guatemala funcionan 3 compañías telefónicas, CLARO, TIGO, MOVISTAR. Las 3 compañías ofrecen llamadas gratis a los números de su misma compañía. Por ejemplo usted tiene un plan telefónico con CLARO, usted puede hacer llamadas gratis a otros números CLARO pero como sabe si el numero al que usted llama es CLARO. Entonces ahora usted puede utilizar la App Identificador para saber a que empresa telefónica esta llamando. ¿Como funciona? Simple usted puede marcar el número de su contacto, o buscarlo en la agenda telefónica de su celular. Al presionar el cuarto dígito la aplicación mostrara el logotipo de la compañía telefónica a la que esta llamando. ¿Donde funciona? Solo funciona para los números telefónicos de la república de Guatemala. Functional ** only ** the Republic of Guatemala ID is a simple and free application, its functionality is to give the user the name of the phone company you are calling. The idea of ​​the application identifier came from Guatemala than 3 phone companies operate, CLARO, TIGO Movistar. The 3 companies offer free calls to numbers in the same company. For example you have a phone plan with CLEAR, you can make free calls to other numbers CLARO but as you know if the number you are calling is CLEAR. So now you can use the App ID to know which phone company is calling. How does it work? Simple you can dial the number of your contact, or look in the phone book on your phone. Pressing the fourth digit the application will display the logo of the telephone company you are calling. Where it works? Only works for the telephone numbers of the Republic of Guatemala.
release_text: Corrección de errores. ------------------- Ahora puedes buscar entre tus contactos. Se actualizo el rango de números. Corrección de errores.

description: Play the most difficult Solitaire variant : Yukon Solitaire. Yukon Solitaire follows most of the rules of the classic Klondike/Patience game. There are a few differences. First, all cards are dealt at once. Next, groups of cards can be moved even if they are not in the correct order. For example, if you have a red eight with a three on top of it, you can move both cards (as a group) to any open black nine. Sounds simple, doesn't it? Try Yukon Solitaire and see how difficult it is to win a game. Warning : download only if you are ready for a challenge! This Yukon Solitaire game supports both drag & drop and tap-to-place game-play. Enjoy this card game on your phone or tablet, in landscape or portrait mode.
release_text: Bug fixes.

description: 両替計算アプリ円算機は、空港などで外貨に両替した時の実質換金率を元に計算できるアプリです。 為替レート基準では無く手元で両替した金額で計算できますので、買い物などで実際に支払う金額が、換金した日本円で何円相当なのかを知ることができます。 使い方： ・両替時の情報を入力(例 50,000円を両替したら544ドル受け取った) ・計算したい現地通貨金額を入力する ・下部に日本円換算金額が表示される ※両替時の情報はアプリ内に保存されています。 ※変更は数値の上書きでおこなうことができます。 外貨両替以外にも様々応用ができるかも！？ ・まとめ買い時の個数あたりの単価割り出し(1000円で30個のものの5個分の金額算出) ・時給に対して分あたりの単価計算(1000円は60分として5分ぶんの金額算出) ・仮想通貨のレート計算 尚、本アプリは広告収益で運営しています。 Exchange calculation app yen Computation is an application that can be calculated based on the real cash rate at the time of the exchange to foreign currency such as the airport. Because it can be calculated by the amount of money that you exchange at hand rather than the exchange rate criterion, it is possible to know what yen amounts you actually pay, such as shopping, whether substantial in Japanese yen you have cash. Usage: · (Received $ 544 After you exchange the example 50,000 yen) Enter the information at the time of exchange • Enter the local currency amount that you want to calculate · Japanese Yen equivalent amount is displayed at the bottom ※ exchange of information at the time are stored within the app. ※ The changes can be made in the override of a number. And be able to have various applied to currency exchange other than! ? · (Amount calculated five minutes of those 30 in 1000 yen) price index of the number per bulk buying at the time , (1000 yen amounts calculated as 5 minutes 60 minutes) Unit Price calculation per minute to hourly wage Rate calculation of virtual currency It should be noted that the present application is operated by advertising revenue.

description: Now featuring the voice of Nancy O'Dell!! StoryChimes is proud to partner with Nancy O'Dell (co-host of Entertainment Tonight) in raising funds for the Muscular Dystrophy Association. Nancy has lent her voice to our Rapunzel StoryChimes! Proceeds benefit Betty's Battle, a foundation Nancy formed with MDA in honor of her mother who passed away from Lou Gehrig's disease in 2008. Download it today to enjoy with your kids today, knowing it may help in the effort to find a cure. Please visit: www.bettysbattle.org and www.als-mda.org for more information. RAPUNZEL **A PTPA AWARD WINNER!*** ABOUT RAPUNZEL Up for a little tangled affair? Then read the Rapunzel StoryChimes! Rapunzel is the classic tale about a beautiful young girl who is a victim of circumstance. She’s trapped in an isolated tower deep in the forest. The evil sorceress has her held captive against her will. Only the young prince can save her from her lonely fate. Enjoy the read! StoryChimes Application Description  StoryChimes are an affordable diverse collection of children’s stories designed to immerse your child in the sights and sounds of interactive tales while keeping the “feel” of turning the pages of a real book. As we like to say, “When you hear the chime, turn the page!” StoryChimes’ stream of new titles will keep you coming back for more fun, adventure and education again and again. The ease-of-use makes it a snap for even the youngest kids to enjoy a StoryChime today. Mom or Dad need a good distraction? No matter how you travel or where you are, StoryChimes are never more than a touch away. An entire collection of books in the palm of your hand, providing a great assortment of entertainment. StoryChimes are the perfect alternative to movies, tv shows and video games. With StoryChimes you can entertain and educate at the same time. Grab one today! FEATURES: - Now includes a match game! - Karaoke like text scroll (highlights red as you read) - Page indexing to access your favorite parts - Bookmarking to pick up where you left off - Read at your own pace without audio and scroll text - Facebook integration - E-mail a friend about the App - Help menu - Larger page turn area - 3D page turn provides a tactile “feel” - Beautiful illustrations - Great music accompanies each story - Enhanced with sound FX Please visit us on the web at www.storychimes.com for more great stories! Have a story suggestion or comment? We’d love to hear it. Drop us a line at info@storychimes.com .
release_text: Support for tablets Improved background audio Improved match game

description: "palmEM is an excellent, rapid point-of-care reference perfectly designed for the time crunch of the emergency department." -iMedicalApps.com Why buy an already outdated paper pocket reference that will become wrinkled, stained, misplaced and forgotten? For a fraction of the cost of even a basic printed guide, you'll never have to buy another quick reference. And you'll always be up-to-date. palmEM is an all-in-one, rapid and succinct, evidence based emergency medicine quick reference. Internal medicine, critical care, family practice and urgent care clinicians will also find palmEM useful. The app is continually updated and expanded. Unlike several other references, updates are free and there are no yearly subscription fees. REVIEWS: "Doc APProvED: The relentless search for an emergency medicine app that does it all will inevitably lead to palmEM...a great quick reference for the price." —Emergency Medicine News "There is so much in here I don’t know where to begin. The app really seems to cover everything...Could I enthuse about this any more???" —LifeInTheFastLane.com "I was paying hundreds of dollars a year for [another app] but I’ve dumped that now. PalmEM is cheaper, prettier, faster and it’s calculators are easier to use in a hurry." —EMtutorials.com "Its succinct design works well with either the iPhone or iPad, and because it is a universal app, users needn’t be torn choosing between either well-optimized versions." —iMedicalApps.com FEATURES: ✔ ABG Interpretation ✔ ACLS & PALS ✔ Acute Limb Ischemia ✔ Acute Kidney Injury ✔ Acute Angle description: This is a free 15-turn version of Conflicts: D-Day 1944, a highly rated turn based strategy game set on the Western Front during the Second World War. General Eisenhower has stepped down and you are in the command of the Allied invasion force - tank, airborne, infantry and air force units - and the object of the game is to break out from the D-Day beachheads and liberate as much of Nazi-occupied France as possible, as quickly as possible. To have a chance to seize the top spot in the Hall of Fame you need to skillfully encircle German units commanded by Erwin Rommel, while battling both the regular Wehrmacht divisions and the feared Panzer VI (Tiger I) tank units. FEATURES: + Long-lasting: Thanks to in-built variation and the game's smart AI technology, each game provides a unique war gaming experience. + Competitive: Measure your strategy game skills against others fighting for the Hall of Fame top spots. + Supports casual play: Easy to pick up, leave off, continue later. + Challenging: Crush your enemy quickly and earn the bragging rights on the forum. + Settings: Various options are available to alter the look of the gaming experience: Switch between terrain themes, change difficulty level, choose icon set for units (NATO or REAL) and cities (Round, Shield, or Square), decide what is drawn on the map, change font and hexagon sizes. + Experienced units learn new skills, like improved attack or defence performance, ability to cross rivers without losing extra move points. + A wide variety of units under your command: Sherman M4 tanks, American/British/Canadian infantry divisions, paratroopers, special units like US Army Rangers and Royal Marines Commando Brigade, Crab mine cleaner tanks and air force units. Meanwhile, the German Wehrmacht starts with coastal fortifications, and weaker ost battalions and static infantry units, but as the days pass, is reinforced with regular infantry, Waffen SS and Panzer divisions. + Historical accuracy: Campaign mirrors the historical setup of the real 1944 Normandy landings - including the divisions that saw combat during the D-Day and the following Normandy Campaign in World War II. In order to be a victorious general, it is essential that you learn to coordinate your attacks in two ways. First, as adjacent units give support to an attacking unit, keep your units in groups in order to gain local superiority. Secondly, it is rarely the best idea to use brute force when it is possible to encircle the enemy and cut off its supply lines instead. You can purchase the full version on Google Play http://bit.ly/I7YIbP Answer the call of duty and join Conflict series on Facebook or Google+! + http://on.fb.me/wsC2QV (FB) + http://bit.ly/GHHGU1 (G+) Join your fellow strategy gamers in turning the tide of the Second World War! To see all the campaigns and scenarios in the Conflicts strategy game series visit: http://bit.ly/GRhzqH Conflict-Series has offered highly rated Android-only strategy games since 2011. The campaigns are based on the time-tested gaming elements TBS (turn-based strategy) enthusiasts are familiar with from both the classic PC war games and legendary tabletop strategy board games. I also want to thank the fans for all the well thought-out suggestions over the years which have allowed these military history campaigns to improve at a much higher rate than what any indie developer could dream of. if you have feedback about the Conflict-Series please use email, this way we can have a constructive back and forth conversion without all the limits of the store's comment system. In addition, because I have huge number of projects on multiple stores, it’s just not very sensible to spend handful of hours each day going through hundreds of pages spread all over the Internet to see if somebody has posted a question somewhere -- just send me an email and I will answer to it as soon as I'm online. Thanks for understanding!

description: Smooth and fast – that’s what ROUTE 66 Navigate is all about. We have perfected our routing engine over the past 20 years to be one of the best in the industry. Proven. ROUTE 66 Navigate uses the same TomTom maps that are used by car brands for their navigation solutions. ROUTE 66 Navigate provides lane guidance and speed limits for optimal guidance – which you’d expect from an expensive car navigation system or personal navigation device. MAPS • Smooth, blazingly fast maps. Vector-based, fully scalable and ultra fast. • Online and offline maps. Enjoy maps with or without internet connection. • Search with character. A few characters – in any order – and we’ll find your destination. • Local Search. It’s all about finding accurate and up-to-date destinations. • Wikipedia on the map. The free encyclopedia. • Weather on the map. Weather has never been more accessible. • Doesn’t the world look a whole lot better in 3D? Stunning 3D buildings and photorealistic landmarks make navigation so much better. NAVIGATION • Automotive quality navigation. We deeply care about correct routes, lane information, speed limits and road signs. • So why would your map always have to look the same? Our map is always just right – bright and clear during the day and incredibly stylish at night. • Nietzsche was right. All truly great thoughts are conceived while walking. • There are a 1,000 different ways to get to Rome. We offer you the best alternatives. You choose. • You can rely on our speed alarms. We automatically warn you when you are speeding. • Wouldn’t it be nice to know exactly which lane to use? Now you can. • Road signs in your navigation. Everything that is relevant to you. • Crystal clear instructions. ‘After 300 yards, turn right onto the A3 towards Basingstoke.’ • Multi-stop routes. Because sometimes going from A to B goes through C. • FREE 30 days trial. Don’t take our word for it. Check out Navigation in ROUTE 66 Navigate for yourself. FOLLOW ME • The future is here. Follow Me puts a virtual car on your camera image, which you just have to follow. • Because not everyone is the same. Choose your own Follow Me car. • Super easy to set-up. ROUTE 66 Navigate automatically detects where to put the virtual Follow Me car. • FREE 30 days trial. Don’t take our word for it. Check out Follow Me in ROUTE 66 Navigate for yourself. SPEED CAMERAS • Speed cameras. Save big on speeding tickets. • App in the foreground? In the background? We’ll warn you anyway. • 95% coverage. We’re working on the other 5. • Timing is everything. Safety and savings, the result. • FREE 30 days trial. Don’t take our word for it. Check out Speed cameras in ROUTE 66 Navigate for yourself. TRAFFIC • HD Traffic. Reliable and super accurate traffic that simply works. • Save up to 18.5% of your time. Proven. • We do the math. You decide what you want to do. • FREE 30 days trial. Don’t take our word for it. Check out HD Traffic in ROUTE 66 Navigate for yourself. For more information, please visit www.66.com.

description: Symptomate has already provided over 500 000 of health checkups! Symptomate is an innovative symptom checker designed by doctors that will help you find out more about your symptoms. Just enter basic information about your health complaints and you will receive a list of potential diagnoses and a recommendation of doctors you should visit. HOW IT WORKS? Symptomate will ask you a few carefully selected follow-up questions regarding your symptoms. Our symptom checker is driven by an advanced artificial intelligence algorithm which uses a broad medical database of over 1000 symptoms and over 500 potential conditions . The medical database of symptoms is carefully created and curated by a team of experienced physicians. We are expanding Symptomate's medical knowledge every day to make it the smartest and most reliable symptom checker. You may help us by installing Symptomate and sharing your feedback with us! Take care of your health -- keep Symptomate on your phone so it will always be there when you need it! KEY FEATURES - Intelligent symptom check designed by doctors - Broad database of more than 500 conditions and 1000 symptoms - Check if your symptoms are serious - Obtain preliminary information regarding potential conditions - Get a free Online Checkup Report on your e-mail - Assist your doctor in finding the right diagnosis ... and a lot more! Below you can find a list of common symptoms checked with Symptomate: - Headache - Abdominal pain - Back pain - Fever - Nausea - Rash - Cough - Chest pain - Lower back pain - Chronic tiredness - Diarrhea - Memory problems - Tootache - Heart races - Fatigue - Depression - Sore throat - Vomiting - Bloating - Weakness - Dizziness - Heartburn - Weight loss - Sweating ... and many more Some common diagnoses include: - Electrolyte disturbances - Migraines - Diabetes - Irritable bowel syndrome - Infectious diarrhea - Flu - Common cold - Food poisoning - Kidney stones - Tension-type headaches - Premenstrual syndrome - Depression syndrome - Asthma ... if you are experiencing any symptoms try Symptomate and check what might be the cause! * Legal notice * Online checkups are for informational and educational purposes only and should not be treated as a doctor's advice, a medical consultation, or a diagnosis. description: SkyWeek is the new, interactive, mobile version of Sky & Telescope magazine’s super-popular “This Week’s Sky at a Glance” web page — a day-by-day calendar of events to observe in the changing night sky. “This Week’s Sky at a Glance” has been Sky & Telescope’s most popular online offering for 21 years. SkyWeek now adds interactive, custom sky maps that are automatically set for your location (not the static version’s compromise for the center of North America). And starting from the sky scene that’s displayed, you can pan all around your heavens, change the scene to other times and dates, and zoom in or out. • All major sky events: eclipses, conjunctions, good meteor showers — miss nothing! • Zoomable constellation charts: pan around your whole sky, and change to any time or date! • Automatically customized to your location worldwide. • Links to more info. Whether you’re a newbie skywatcher or an experienced amateur astronomer, SkyWeek will become your handy, everyday guide to what’s up.

Play different difficulty levels ✽ Designed for young minds and tiny fingers, the gameplay is simple and without fuss - filled with heaps of lighthearted fun and even more room to grow! ✽ Parents can review performance history for each subject to check on how their child is doing. ✽ Accompanied by a friendly voice guidance, children are encouraged to play and learn at their own pace. ✽ Multiple play modes allow even the youngest mind to learn and explore with a basic shape-fitting mode. ✽ my Teaching Kindergarten keeps children engaged with a rather unique reward system where children earn a coin for every seven correct answers What you learn: • Sight Words: Dolch (Pre-K), Dolch (K) • Addition: up to a total of 10 • Subtraction: from 10 down • Spelling: complete words by choosing the missing letter Endless fun and learning to be enjoyed all for the price of one. description: Young scientists learn to analyse the physical world by measuring across a variety of domains - time, size, weight and money. 5-8 year old kids measure length, weight, time and money in this science app using a tape, a scale, a clock and coins in 20 exercises. Full version has 300+ exercises of increasing difficulty. Lite version has 5 exercises of each game - * Length Measure length and width of pencils, ribbons, balls and bookmarks - whole, halves and quarters. * Time Show time on an analog and digital clock in hours, half-hours, quarter-hours and 5 minutes. * Money Measure weights of watermelons, bottles, balls, boxes and many more. * Weight Pay for drinks, purses, fruits and many more using the coins. These exercises help kids practice their scientific concepts in a practical way using made-up units of measurement. The mathematical concepts practiced include fractions, count-by-fives, addition by tens and hundreds, total using 25s, 10s, 5s and 1s. Some of the exercises can be solved in more than one way. Kids experiment with solutions as they play. Our Story When we looked for apps to help teach our kids, we couldn't find any that were good. One was just information text for the kids to learn by rote. Another was multiple-choice tests - just press buttons. A third had 2 sound-tracks and 4 animations running all at the same time. How was a kid supposed to focus? So, we designed and built them games - that teach in the way parents and teachers explain concepts, and engage in the way playing does.

description: Android手機專用名片辨識系統與人脈管理工具 *** 試用版本提供以下功能，讓您免費體驗名片管理的基本功能 *** - 免費提供50張名片影像儲存與資料辨識功能。 - 免費版本支援名片簿備份功能，購買正式版本後即可隨時還原所有備份資料。 - 免費提供基本匯出功能，可將姓名、電話及肖像圖等三項資料匯出至系統通訊錄，購買正式版本即可匯出所有聯絡資訊至手機聯絡人。 *注意：升級為蒙恬名片王付費版本只需US$ 9.99，即可享有無限制張數的名片辨識、管理、聯繫、匯入與匯出功能。 ◆市場肯定◆ *獲得全球知名手機品牌(如HTC)、電信業者(如中華電信、台灣大哥大)、專業CRM廠商(如JustSystem)青睞，全球用戶突破2000萬以上。 *榮獲「美國無線通訊展大獎-商業應用類別」( CTIA E-Tech Awards Winner)的肯定、台灣區數位內容產品獎。 ◆產品資訊◆ 全新一代WorldCard Mobile讓您直接利用Android相機鏡頭拍攝名片並進行辨識，即可自動分析名片上的姓名、公司、部門、職稱、地址、電話、電子郵件…等資訊並存入手機或Google聯絡人的聯絡資訊欄位，快速點選就能撥打電話、發送email、路徑規劃，更能連結至Facebook、Twitter、LinkedIn等社群網站的個人頁面，打造個人化行動人脈秘書！ ★免逐筆輸入，也能隨身管理多語名片★ *拍攝名片後立即精准辨識；可辨識英文、繁體中文、簡體中文、日文、韓文等名片。 *自動分析名片上的聯絡資訊，並將辨識後的資料依據欄位屬性自動分類，包含姓名、公司、部門、職稱、位址、電話、電子郵件等。 *個人化群組管理，可自行將連絡人分類並搜尋，或使用拼音索引等索引設定快速找到連絡人，更提供大頭貼顯示功能。 *提供清單與影像模式, 可供使用者以熟悉的方式快速流覽連絡人資訊 ★點選操作快，各種連絡功能全都整合★ *內建名片簿(CARD HOLDER)功能，可直接撥打電話、傳送簡訊或EMAIL。 *提供智慧型規劃路徑，免輸入客戶位址也能輕鬆查詢與拜訪；支持與Google Map, 百度地圖和搜狗地圖APP整合。 *提供多元社群網站連結功能, 透過姓名、EMAIL欄位，可輕鬆在FACEBOOK、LINKEDIN、TWITTER社群網站平臺搜尋連絡人資訊，讓您有更多元的應用。 ★全方位共用，聯絡資訊可交換與應用★ *可透過Gmail跨平臺同步您的連絡人 *辨識客戶來信之電子郵件簽名檔，也能快速建立聯絡人。 *也可以QR-Code方式辨識名片資訊並快速建立連絡人 *聯絡人資訊可匯出應用至手機通訊錄、Google聯絡人、Exchange聯絡人或將連絡人資料上傳至雲端空間，如華為網盤或Dropbox。

description: "The Wedding Guide & Planner" provides step-by-step instructions for creating the wedding of your dreams without putting you, your fiancee, and your parents in the poor house. And, it allows you to organize and keep all your wedding details with you on your iPhone or iPad. How-to sections include: Colors and Themes - how to select your signature colors and wedding theme Stationery - what stationery you will need, and samples of each Registering - an explanation of bridal registries, and what you will need as a new bride Attire - descriptions of the various types of wedding gowns, tuxes and bridesmaid's dresses, and a list of gown designers Transportation - everything from limos to buses The Ceremony - what you need to know to choose a ceremony venue, descriptions of various faiths' weddings, and a state-by-state list of who can officiate Flowers - a description of the various types of bridal bouquets, and how to make your own bouquets and boutonnieres The Reception - the upsides and downsides of various reception venues, and how to keep costs down The Seating Chart - how to lay out your reception venue Catering - what to be aware of when choosing a caterer, and how to keep costs down The Cake - strategies for getting your dream cake and eating it too Music - the various types of ceremony and reception music, music suggestions, and how to hire a DJ or band Photography/Videography - how to hire a wedding photographer, the types of photos, and how not to get ripped off. Planning sections include: Stationery - stationers and the types of stationery Guest List - information for each guest, including special menu and hotel needs Registry - everywhere you are registered and and date information Attire - all your attire vendors, dress specifics, and dates Transportation - your transportation vendor details Ceremony - specifics for each ceremony venue Florist - all your floral vendors and the types of flowers Reception - specifics for each reception venue and the types of amenities offered Seating Chart - a table-by-table list of all your guests Catering - specifics for all your catering vendors Bakery - all your bakery vendors, and the types of cakes and sweets offered Music - details for DJs and live bands Photo/Video - specifics for each photography and videography vendor Timeline - a comprehensive checklist starting twelve months before the wedding. This is the only wedding guide and planner you'll ever need.

description: Threes is tiny puzzle that grows on you. ∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞ “It's surprisingly adorable, for a game starring numbers.” ~ Joystiq “It’s the kind of game that embosses the rules on your brain within 30 seconds, but then compels you to spend the next two hours playing.” ~ Pocket Tactics ∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞ Explore our little game’s deep challenge and grow your mind beyond imagination. ³ Endless challenge from one simple game mode ³ An endearing cast of characters ³ A heart-warming soundtrack ³ No IAP - Threes is a complete experience the moment you download it Honorably mentioned for Excellence in Design by the Independent Games Festival. ∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞ From the makers of PUZZLEJUICE: ³ Designed by Asher Vollmer ³ Illustrated by Greg Wohlwend (Ridiculous Fishing, Hundreds) ³ Scored by Jimmy Hinson (Black Ops 2, Mass Effect 2) ³ Android by Hidden Variable (Bag It!, Tic Tactics) ∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞∞ Threes grows with you and you’ll grow with Threes.

Find a link to our store in the menu! ³ Lots of optimizations Thank you for playing <3 We don't feel comfortable interrupting your game experience to ask for reviews, but if you are feeling generous with your time please take a moment and let us know what you think of the game ^__^

description: Pyramid Solitaire is a game where there is a pyramid of cards. You need to remove all the cards in the pyramid. You will be surprised how addictive it is! There are already MILLIONS of gamers playing Pyramid Solitaire on the web for FREE! - Classic but challenging gameplay: K's can be removed by itself, while other cards must be removed by matching with another card that sums up to 13. - The kings can be removed by themselves but the other cards must be removed by matching with another card that sums up to 13. Awesome for people who play similar Android games, card games, puzzle games, or match three games, like Match 3, Angry Birds, Scrabble, Tap Fish, Farm Story, Paradise Island, War, Bejeweled, and hundreds of others. If you end up liking Pyramid solitaire there are lots of other free games from Fupa Games: - Bricks Breaking - Gems Swap - Pyramid Solitaire - Marble Lines - Bouncing Balls
